title.romaji: Tensai Ouji no Akaji Kokka Saisei Jutsu
title.english: The Genius Prince's Guide to Raising a Nation Out of Debt
title.native: 天才王子の赤字国家再生術

synonyms: บูรณะมันวุ่นวาย ขายชาติเลยแล้วกัน
天才王子的赤字国家振兴术
Kiat Pemulihan Negara Berutang Ala Pangeran Genius
description:
Once upon a time in a far away land there lived a prince, a genius prince. The genius prince fought alongside his people and led them to a great many triumphs. However, truth be told, he just wants to let everything go and live in tranquility.

(Source: Funimation)
